ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Fighter armor and weapons at low level
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a 40 druid and have a lot of friends that have alts (in other words I power lvl ppl a lot lol) .....my normal way to go is to take then to a level
ygData.messageBody:
I have a 40 druid and have a lot of friends that have alts (in other words I
power lvl ppl a lot lol) .....my normal way to go is to take then to a level
appropriate area (since I'm high enough, I generally take then to oasis - i
can keep them alive there) then sow skin str and ds them....then heal when
needed....for a change I won't ds them, rather I let them hit the monster
down to half hps then take it out myself (don't ds and then kill it yourself
- they won't get exp)

But since oasis is also still dangerous to you, I'd stay in ec....anything
that is blue to you, have him whack at and that should work.

As for armor....a suit of fs on Drinal costs about 1500pp, bronze is much
less, so that might work better....You might hang around nfp and auc for
good warrior armor for the money you have, some ppl just want to get rid of
stuff and sell for super cheap or are quitting the game and getting rid of
everything on them....

I have a 23 warrior, and my druid recently was widowed (he quit the game)
and I had 2 really nice wedding rings....so I sold them and hung around nfp
for a while, and managed to get a full suit of crafted (warrior specific
quest armor) minus the helm for 1200 - quite a lot less then the going price
on my server....

sorry off the subject there had to brag :)

And as for a weapon, my warrior has icetooth claws (11/29) and a giant
militia longsword (11/39) but she started out with kodiak claws (I think
7/30) and a langseax (I think 6/28) The giant militia longsword is about
80pp on my server, but the icetooths are a couple hundred *I think* they
were a gift.....

I hope this helps somewhat :)

Synthea Firestorm
L40 Druidess
Sirens of the Storm - Drinal Server
